channel.title: Favorite Half-Life weapon
channel.description:
We wanna know what weapon you liked and maybe a little bit why. It can be a Half-Life weapon to Half-life 2 and anything far and inbetween including the leak if ya can rember any. Make to tell us were it comes from.
Half-Life: Tau/Gauss Cannon This one got me threw thick and thin even in the online verstion :p I love you trust Gauss Cannon Hall-Life:BlueShift: This ones a bit confuseing If the hd verstion is ps2 only i got a "messed up" BlueShift because i got a M4A1 Carbine :p fun to shoot marines with their own weapon :p Half-Life: OpposingForces:Hmm well i gotta choose 2 the Deagle and Spore Launcher Half-Life 2 Leak: this is a hard one umm umm Grr too many I'll go with the SniperRifle and the umm Hopmine thingys Half-Life 2: Zero-Point Gravity gun (organic) Bulling for combine any one ;p Half-Life 2 ep.1: Zero-Point Gravity gun (organic) what can I say I just love throwing combine at each other Half-Life ep.2: Smg1 its just too useful

item.title: Favorite Half-Life weapon
item.dc:creator: fury
item.description:
my personal ranking:

#1 Tau Cannon (HL1, awesome soundeffects, awesome movement, awesome gamestyle possibilities, loved to wallspam all the spawns on crossfire :> )

#2 Long Jump Module

#3 Crossbow (HL1, liked how the bow worked in HL1DM)

#4 Glock (HL1, love the sounds and fire modes…)

#5 MP5 Grenades (HL1, like how they fly through the air spinning around themselves… makes me wanna fire them all the time…)

#6 RPG (HL1, love controling rockets with the laser… found it useful to be able to turn off laserdot)

#7 EGON! :> (cool sound, fkn powerful, fkn annoying… fkn GREAT [maybe a bit overpowered… but ok… i hope it will have a cool down function or need more ammo in bms… otherwise it will be too spamy)

#8 Sporelauncer (HL1:Op4)

#7 SATCHEL (HL1… found them way more effective than HL2 SLAMS)

#8 Barnacle (HL1:Op4, nice hook-function)

#9 357 Revolver (HL2, liked it more because of its animations… less annoying than the HL1 fidget animation… but I liked HL1’s 357 zoom function… Missed it in HL2)

#10 Crowbar (HL1, loved its attackspeed… even if it was a bit unrealistic… and liked the animations)

#11 Tripmines (HL1, loved to trip-mine climb on some maps)

#12 Snarks

#13 Shotgun (HL1, better ammolimit, better animations)

#14 Hornet (HAHAHAH beeeeeessss )

#15 Shovel (HL2:Smod )

Read full topic

My favourite half life weapon is Assault Rifle. Because it is Fully-automatic. Its Ammunition is bullet.

item.title: Favorite Half-Life weapon
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
The RPG in HL1 was my favorite when I first played it. I just thought it was so cool being able to steer the rockets around without it feeling clunky.

OP4 I liked the Spore Launcher way too much.

HL2 I would definitely say the Gravity Gun, followed by the Pulse Rifle.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Half-Life weapon
item.dc:creator: jefcully
item.description:
I would go with the Gravity Gun. It has been invaluable in Ravenholm and crucial in many other situations.Then I would pick the shotgun. I hate being surprised, and the shotgun is the perfect solution for my troubles. Right click and the problem is resolved.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Half-Life weapon
item.dc:creator: doramider7
item.description:
Neon Impulse:

am I the ONLY one who likes the egon gun best!? It just looks and sounds so awesome, and it REALLY packs a punch!

Satchel Charges, their like super-ultra-double-mega-awesome-grenades. The best part is that you can place them all over a map and kill almost whatever you want with them.
